issue.title: [C++] Thirdparty CMake error get_target_property() called with non-existent target LZ4::lz4
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4950](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4950). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With CMake 3.2 https://travis-ci.org/kszucs/crossbow/builds/507811485

```Java

docker-compose build cpp-cmake32
docker-compose run --rm cpp-cmake32
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4950?focusedCommentId=16796700) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3979
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3979>
